title: Business Analyst (m/f/d)

company.name: Eufomex

tasks: Interact with stakeholders to understand their needs, challenges, and goals
Analyze existing business processes to identify opportunities for improvement
Gather requirements and document them clearly

experience.business_requirements: Proficient in transforming business requirements into technical solution designs
experience.data_analysis: Ability to analyze large amounts of data and business processes
experience.technical_skills: Strong understanding of databases, reporting, and data analysis
experience.big_data: General knowledge of BigData, Hadoop, and ETL processes

skills_required.education: University degree in Business Administration or Quantitative Science (Computer Science, Finance, Mathematics, Physics, or related field)
skills_required.communication: Strong leadership skills and excellent English verbal and written communication skills
